statements: DELETE FROM budgeting_processes WHERE software_integration = true;
DELETE FROM budgeting_processes WHERE software_integration = true AND process_name = 'Annual Budgeting';
DELETE FROM Budgets WHERE budget_name = 'Monthly Budget' AND start_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Budgets WHERE id = 1 AND budget_name = 'Business Budget';
DELETE FROM Expenses WHERE category = 'Travel' AND date_incurred = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM budget_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001 AND category = 'Food';
DELETE FROM Budgets WHERE budget_id = 10 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Budgets WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30' AND budget_id = 20;
